A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was.....really not quite as good as 7 :/ The setup and personalities in previous film was mostly discarded. Then there was a really large romance adventure segment that developed a character with literally nothing that comes out of it. It was SO jarring in middle of everything\, reminds me of Lucas's special cuts in original trilogy.\nThe philosophy of light and dark was done really well though\, about the only good part in the film :/
